website_summaries.verdict: The D5 has a combo brush that's fantastic for pet hair and includes a find me function in case it gets stuck while cleaning.
pros: Works with Amazon Alexa for voice control
WiFi connected for remote control app
Find me function for easy robot location
LaserSmart navigation scans and maps room
Great if you have pets or allergies
Returns to base to charge if necessary to complete job
Runs up to 90 minutes between charges
Picks up amazing amount of pet hair
cons: WiFi connectivity can be a challenge

customer_reviews.title: This unit is terrible! It literally gets stuck in the middle of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exactly sure how to contact the seller. This unit is terrible! It literally gets stuck in the middle of my living room every three to five minutes! It has nothing jammed, i push the button and it goes right back to cleaning for another three to five minutes. . I want to return or figure out how to make it work properly but Amazon doesn't make it easy to contact seller. Kind of upset i have to give it a star at all
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the backside...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Neato and, although it cleans well, it is constantly offline. It has no display screen so you can only use the app to see what is wrong and, again, it mostly tells you it's offline and you have to reset it. I have to reset mine almost weekly. Secondly it doesn't recognize the magnetic strip so it gets stuck in places that I do not want it to go. I love technology and I love the Neato but this version is not working for me. I
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Neato Connected Losing WiFi
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th Neato but the first with WiFi. The unit constantly loses it's connection and goes off line. We have a super strong router and signal and operate lots of devices on the WiFi. We have returned this Botvac 5 to Neato three times for warranty repair when we are unable to get it reconnected. Neato returns it with no improvement or fix to the problem. They will not tell us what they are finding wrong. I believe they cannot or will not fix their software problem and are anxious for our warranty period to end. No more Neato's for us.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Poor quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum back in November of 2017 and by June 2018 it already started having mechanical issues. I bought this knowing it probably wouldn't last more than 2 years but I was extremely surprised it started falling a part after 6 months. You are probably thinking this is an isolated incident but it's not. You see I've owned 2 other models I've bought over the years and the longest one has lasted is 2 years. The sad thing is when this unit works it does a great job but for the money it should probably have a little longer life in my opinion. I'd write more about my experience but Amazon censored my review.
customer_reviews.author: BoxMan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazing for the first year. Now it is a useless paperweight. When it worked it had tons of suction, plenty for our 2 dogs who are moderate shedders. Had no issue climbing over floor trim from carpet to wood floor. The no go lines once set worked great 9 times out of 10. Now it just leaves the dock and if it starts, it will try to back up the wall for minutes. Have gone through all the cleaning recommendations and even sent in for repair to no avail. I would not recommend spending this much money for something that doesn’t seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: NexCorax

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, way better than Roomba, died after 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ability to get everything from the floor, as opposed to a similarly priced Roomba which ran around like a headless chicken missing entire zones. App is also very well done, has scheduling and zones capabilities, cleaning map after each run. Unfortunately, it just died after 1.5 years, so I took 2 stars away, but will get a new one WITH extended protection plan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Radu Serbanescu

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: If you are even considering this in the slightest you need to do it now. At the price of most reasonable vacuum cleaners I was a little hesitant to purchase knowing that I would likely not work as well as a larger vacuum. But it is SO NICE to come home every day to a clean floor (our main level is mostly hardwood with a small patch of carpet). Having hard floors you see everything and when it is clean it looks so nice. Bernice struggled initially and got stuck on many things but I guess she learned over time and now never gets stuck (unless the dog doesn't move and she runs over her tail :( )
customer_reviews.author: Greg L. Majkrzak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine! I must admit that I did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine! I must admit that I did not have much in the way of high hopes for a robot vacuum. And, even less for selling the idea to my wife. However, the sand and dirt tracked in from the beach, required too much spousal work (and guilt on my part). And even though I do not recommend buying your wife a vacuum for Valentines Day, I did. Wow, this thing blows both of us away! We are in a one story condo with hard surface floors throughout. It has worked flawlessly from day one. Have tried to train "Broomhilda" to fetch wine, but no joy with that endeavor. Great product, Neato!
customer_reviews.author: Brookdent

customer_reviews.title: Badass Machine
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but docked it, turned it on and away it went. Cleaned living room, kitchen and 2 bedrooms before it needed a charge. Docked itself and charged then right back where it left off. Cleaned the last bedroom and 2 bathrooms and back to the dock. Couple of suggestions: Pick all charging cables up If rugs have frilly ends, tuck them under the rug Worked great transfering from hardwood to carpet and back. Does great with dog hair and dog food and even goes under furniture and behind recliners. Very impressive machine. Way better than any of the iRobot units we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics Dude

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, as long as you don't plan to actually use the WiFI feature, the main reason to spend the money on this model.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to vacuum and navigate well enough, but trying to get the thing to properly connect to wifi (which is the main reason to purchase this model) is apparently impossible. Have tried every suggestion I can find online (no special characters in wifi name, ports open, static IP to D5, etc etc etc) and it absolutely refuses to connect. At all. Have no issue with the other 15+ devices in the house, just this stupid thing. I fail to see how in this day and age this device was released with such horrid limitations on a supposed feature like wifi connectivity. Will start looking at other products to replace this one if I can't get it to actually work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Maestrobasser

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: We did quite a bit of research before purchasing the Neato. It was consistently rated very high and was much more affordable than better known brands. This thing is amazing. It has learned our house after 3-4 cleanings and goes everywhere. We have hardwood floors as well as carpet and tile. It does it all and well. We have a big house and when it runs out of charge, it docks itself, charges and then goes right back to where it left off and starts again. It goes under the bed, around everything and cleans everywhere. I jokingly said last night as it was vacuuming that I think I love our Neato as much as the family dog!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TSB

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product that wouldn't connect to wifi, conducted incomplete cleans, and then shut down and never worked again
customer_reviews.text: Product has promise but a litany of issues early in ownership (3 days into ownership) left me displeased. Especially at this price point. Issues upon opening: 1. Failure to initially connect and then stay connected to wifi 2. Difficulty connecting and stay connected to Google Home 3. Said it cleaned the whole apartment on several occasions and returned to base with several hundred square feet of apartment left uncleaned 4. Sent a message that it needed to shut down and then never functioned correctly again after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the neato cleaning but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the neato D5 for just under a year. I am having trouble with it now. I have been attempting to get customer service to help since 25 January. I have several email back and forth but still no resolution. I have tried all the procedures they have sent but still it is not working. The product does a great job cleaning and would highly recommend the vacuum. I have 3 dogs and it does a great job .... but it has not worked since the 25th and customer service continues to ask the similar questions and same troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Jdh

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect but it will do the job..maybe get lost too
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had neato before and I think I like the older one better than this new one. We haven’t had it very long and already it’s squeaking while it’s running and I thought we would see on a map where the neato is when he’s stuck but 9/10 time I have to search for him when we get home. Then he returns to the base station and says he’s done even though more than half of the house hasn’t been vacuumed. The filter isn’t that easy to clean either so we will definitely need to remember to keep filters on hand and change them more frequently than we did with the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Oopsiemommy

customer_reviews.title: Started off great but........
customer_reviews.text: Well I loved this little guy, I called mine Baymax as he was super helpful. He only got stuck once in my house and never did again. He was able to clean my 1200sqft lower floor level with 50% charge remaining, but after just 14 cycles it all went wrong. Just like the big hero 6 movie, Baymax was suffering from 'loowww battery' now he gets about 1/3 of the way round the lower floor and just dies, doesn't even get to attempt to turn back to his charging station, just stops dead. So sent it right back. Such a shame, my house was super clean, while he worked he was great 😫
customer_reviews.author: Anthony XJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than Samsung's attempt at a robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: After testing the Samsung R9250 for three weeks, hands down the Neato D5 is better. Lower profile, better floor sweep pattern. The R9250 gets lost, will repeatitively sweep confusing corners, or get stuck under chair legs. The neato D5 won't, it's tracking program is more robust. This is a reliable product, and as it is automated, it allows one to gain time back into one's life. The Wi-Fi programming works. Unsure why others are complaining. I have a combined 2.4 and 5GHz Wi-Fi network. It connects and stays connected on current software version. My only complaint is that the bin design is patterned on the plastic surface. This pattern when scratched enhances the scuff marks and cannot be wiped away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryo S.

customer_reviews.title: Having a vacbot is life-altering when it functions so I strongly encourage you to do research and buy one but this is not what you are looking for unless you like getting frustrated and chatting with tech support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Neato Botvac 5 in August of 2017 after doing quite a bit of research on the various options available. My first Neato never functioned correctly and was replaced. The replacement unit, after functioning perfectly for only 3 full runs, has now developed the same frustrating issues of 'no robot found' while clearly showing it is connected to my wifi. Having a vacbot is life-altering when it functions so I strongly encourage you to do research and buy one but this is not what you are looking for unless you like getting frustrated and chatting with tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Wesselman

customer_reviews.title: Takes control of dog hair
customer_reviews.text: The Neato does a great job with keeping up with dog hair!! It covers a big area and will sometimes hit an area more than once when it needs it. I do move the chairs out from the table and the breakfast bar just so it gets a better grip on the dog hair that gets caught between the chairs, but you do not have to do that. It has great suction and it is always full each time I run it. This is our second one and the upgrade has been fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Once I received it I quickly became disappointed. I was unsuccessful in pairing the app the ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did my homework looking at reviews between robot vacs and confidently purchased the D5. Once I received it I quickly became disappointed. I was unsuccessful in pairing the app the first time. I called the 800 number to see if there was any support and no one was able to take my call then hung up on me. The next day I tried to connect again and was unsuccessful. Again, I called the 800 number and Ray listened to my issue and refused to trouble shoot over the phone but insisted to email me the same video that is in the app about pairing (I am a m have multiple devices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recent software update closes gap with higher models and adds mapping capability.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Labrador so daily vacuuming is a must for us. This vacuum is programmed to run every night and each time it runs it has a full bin in the morning. A software update in December of 2017 enabled it to draw you a map of what it's done, as well as show you exactly where it is when it gets stuck. This seems to have been one of the big dividing features between it and the next up model. I got this one on sale for under 500 otherwise I would have gone for the more affordable D3 model, but I am completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: squeaker

customer_reviews.title: D5 is good, D7 seems much better
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th robovac due to the flooding in Houston and my high expectations from the next few I've tried. In the end I ended up exchanging this for the d7. The d5 seemed to not resume and continue cleaning after charging. Great suction power and the dust bin is the largest I've seen. Smart mapping seems to be spotty since it doesn't like to go around our beds (and signals it's complete) for some reason. The d7 also has the "no-go" lines and floor plans that this one didn't offer. Good customer service and took the return no prob!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Unusable because it will not stay paired/connected
customer_reviews.text: Drops connection every 1-2 Days and now will not reconnect. I’ve been all over the internet looking for solutions and have tried them all. My best guess from everything I’m reading is that it is dropping the connection to Neato’s servers. But this time I can’t even get it to reboot into pairing mode. Am now starting to research my return options.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuums
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Neato. Fist one lasted about 4 years before the motor for the "eye" burnt out. Instead of fixing it, we decided to upgrade and WOW what a wonderful upgrade it was. About half as loud as the last one. The side brush is a nice addition and the dust bins size and ease of use are quite user friendly. Highly recommend these fine pieces of equipment (all Neato models).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kerik-Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Could not love this little vacuum more!
customer_reviews.text: I have two kids and two dogs (who shed NONSTOP) and I have never been able to keep my floors clean even vacuuming 2+ per week. I run this vacuum everyday, sometimes twice a day and when/if it breaks it will be because of overuse and I will run, not walk, to the nearest store to buy another. This thing is worth every penny. This vacuum is much more advanced than other robot vacuums I have seen in use, it has a defined path and knows where its been and where it needs to go, it doesn't just bounce around aimlessly.
customer_reviews.author: mlreede

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW BEST FRIEND ROSIE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love Rosie, she saves me so much time, it's really great to have some extra time to do all my other cleaning jobs and with a few pets she picks up all the dog hair too!!! However watch that your pets didn't leave any presents for her cause she will suck them up too.. One of my dogs must have left a turd that I missed when I did my inspection of all the rooms before starting Rosie, no problem Rosie is very thorough in her clean up everyday. YUK!! BUT at least she tried to suck it up good so she didn't drag too much around the house.. Those dogs need to stop leaving presents for her!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Good little substitute for ME!
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say, I'm lazing in bed right now and just told it to get to work! Also, when it texted me to tell me it was stuck, it called me "dude" I might have laughed a bit over that! Also, I thought my floors were "decent" but turns out, ugh, might need to sharpen up the ol lenses in my glasses because I definitely empty the bin every use! Blaming it on teenagers and dusty roads! If you're thinking of buying one of these, do it! Pretty good little beast right there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good at first then turned to junk
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when we first got it. Great battery life, cleaned well and being able to create invisible walls on the app was awesome. After a year things began to break. The battery would not last an entire clean cycle and the dust bin latch broke. Now the laser system is broken and I was told by Neato I would need to send it to an authorized service center for repair. Compared to my 6 year old Roomba the Neato isn’t even close in quality. For the price I hoped it was better made and Neato stood behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: The best money you will ever spend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Neato. Sadly, Alice passed after two years of hard labor, vacuuming a large house with giant dogs every single day of her life. Anyway, Roxanne has replaced her, and she is doing an amazing job. I love that she is connected and lets me know when she’s done and if she is in trouble. Plus if she’s stuck, she gives me her map location so I’m not climbing under all the beds looking for her.
customer_reviews.author: criswela

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in Feb of 2019. It is now December 30th, 2019, and our robot has stopped working. We keep getting an error code 3000, and we have followed all of the troubleshooting, as far as the air compressor and rotating the laser sensor etc. I’ve even hard reset and tried creating a new floor plan. All our robot does is pull away from the base, and sit checking surroundings just to turn off and on a couple of times before completely stopping and throwing code 3000 again.
customer_reviews.author: David & Jeany Tennant

customer_reviews.title: I encourage you not to waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It does a fine job when it's actually working, but both our original unit and replacement unit stopped working with the same error code. Clearly a consistent flaw. When we requested our original one be fixed or replaced under the warranty, we were without any device for 6 weeks because they were 'on backorder'... but available for sale on Amazon. When the replacement unit broke, we were outside of the warranty (which was not extended even though we were without the product for an extended period of time). A lot of money wasted. We won't be purchasing anything else from this company and I would recommend you don't either.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued for a reason... garbage model.
customer_reviews.text: It worked a few times over the two years of ownership. Constant WiFi connection issues, and it getting stuck between everything. Now, it won't even run or connect to our app. Blue light flashes as does the battery light. Support has been silent. While it is a discontinued model, you'd think that after spending $600 they would support their customers in hopes that they buy their latest model. As it comes from China, this doesn't surprise me as their customer service is atrocious.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Karnes

customer_reviews.title: Robot died at 3 months, been in repair for another month, and still missing
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum worked well for 3 months before having a hardware/software malfunction and becoming a brick. I worked through all levels of the service department trying all the resets and reboot until they determined it needed to be shipped in for repairs. I have worked with 4 different Neato service members over this time period and after trouble shooting for almost a month today, no one knows what's wrong with my robot or where it even is. Service department told me 2 days ago they'd have information within 24 hours... And after I called back today they still don't know what's going on. In a competitive market, you can find a cheaper company and hopefully better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Buffum, MS, LMHC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology and awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of technology. Also have the shark ion 750. The Neato makes the shark seem like a toy, as it’s a real vacuum. More importantly, the method of vacuuming (grid pattern with lidar mapping) vs the drunk sailor approach is way more efficient and thorough. I’ve done side by side comparisons now for about a week (bot battles),and the Neato wins hands down. My downstairs is about 1300sf, and Neato maps and reaches every sf. The Shark will take weeks to get every sf based on its random travels. Well worth the higher price.
customer_reviews.author: ibluewater

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I have now gone through 2 of these. First one lasted 2 weeks and then wouldnt charge so I returned it to amazon. Second one lasted 3 months. The motor would spin up and turn off. A friend convinced me to get it and he has also gone through two of them. When they warranty it you will be out the vac for over 6 weeks. When it works itnworks well bit dealing with a broken vac every 3 minths isnt worth it. I cant imagine this actually lasting over a year. If it does I am sure it will break shortly after and be out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Bob spelling

customer_reviews.title: Pet hair monster
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of cleaning. I used it just two days after vacuuming with a Dyson and it picked up so much more pet hair. Update after 6 months of use; Dropping to three stars because I had to return one unit because it just would sit there trying to figure out what to do. The replacement process was smooth and I missed it while it was gone. BUT the new one makes a horrendous noise. Sounds like your dragging a rake over a chalkboard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Iwanaga

customer_reviews.title: Botvac GOOD. Customer Service BAD.
customer_reviews.text: The Botvac worked well for the first month then it failed to start-up after it's first firmware upgrade. I sent it in for repair or replacement which was expected to take 7 - 10 days. After 39 days I still do not have a replacement and the company continues to tell me they are experiencing "inventory issues" and declined to give me a refund even though their warranty states "...if Neato Robotics cannot reasonably repair or replace the Product to refund the price paid...". At this point I don't know when I'll get a replacement and expect it will be some re-fabbed unit. I was ready to recommend the Botvac, but their customer service changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pearse

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: This to it is stupid my cheap bobsweep is faster and smarter. This gets stuck all the time. I like the design and idea it would go and charge then finish it doesn't. Leaves half the house not cleaned. Slams into everything. Doesn't stay connected to inernet.
customer_reviews.author: Trump2020

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter
customer_reviews.text: We used to have one of the older models. It was may more rickety and clackety. This version is much quieter as we have uneven floor tiles for it to roll over. The seal on the filter bin is much tighter too which is important for our bumpy floors. The old version used to pop open unexpectedly. Love the app. It really does slam on the breaks and avoids areas it's not supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum Poor customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Great navigation and feature set. Compared to the Roomba that we had previously it cleans much faster and much more neatly. Love that it can drive between different rooms, it’s very methodical. App is quite nice but would like to have a feature for the Apple Watch allowing you to select a spot clean. Update: When I moved I was completely unable to connect the vacuum to wifi despite multiple resets. Unfortunately Neato no longer staffs a support center "because Covid." Poor, Poor service. Online troubleshooting guides are unhelpful, and chat is extremely tedious. No indication of why Covid means their agents can type but not speak, just another company using this excuse to cut costs.
customer_reviews.author: mistaM

customer_reviews.title: Love this Neato Robot!!
customer_reviews.text: Coming home to a clean house is awesome! I have tested the D5 a handful of times while I have been home and yesterday was the first day I ran it while we were away. It ran perfectly and I came home to a fur free floor! The amount of fur and dirt this machine picks up is incredible. Why did I wait so long to buy this???
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa M Uttley

customer_reviews.title: Changed my cleaning life!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine from the first time. I have polished concrete floors and the blade brush cleans and polishes the surface. Picks up dog hair and gets under and around almost everything in my home. Maneuvers regular pile rugs ( cannot do shag) and area rugs. Dust bin and other areas easy to clean. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: e g hess

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: It's not always the smartest thing, but I run it very often and it's a lifesaver when it comes to pet hair. My dog sheds SO MUCH. I clean out the reservoir every 2 runs and it's full of pet hair, dirt, and dust. It has problems connecting to my phone sometimes, but it will run even if you don't have it connected so it's all good. I love this bot, can't believe it took me so long to get one!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have to vacuum maybe once a week. Just click start on my phone and go to bed. Just amazing. Get extra filters because you won't believe what comes out of carpets, rugs, even the corners and under the furniture with hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Graham P Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Love my Codsworth
customer_reviews.text: Codsworth does a great job in our 1800 square foot home! It's almost like watching an Olympic sport for our two-year-old. He makes an optimal path and is very gentle with loose toys. If he doesn't have enough juice to get the job done in one go, he goes home, rests, and marches back out on his mission. He hasn't gotten stuck anywhere he couldn't get himself out of...yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Love my Neato!
customer_reviews.text: Agador (I named him) has changed my life! Life with pets is fabulous but when you have to sweep or vacuum daily it can be the pits. The added app control is great to set up cleaning days and know when his filter is full or needs to be put back on the charger. To leave him running in the morning before leaving to coming home to clean floors is fabulous! Carpets, tile, and hardwoods - I'm thrilled with this purchase and can't believe I waited so long to get one!
customer_reviews.author: TFox

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, wifi is iffy.
customer_reviews.text: My one and only complaint is that it doesn't want to stay connected to wifi! Otherwise great little vacuum. It seems to navigate the floor very effectively and there's only a wisp or two of dust and hair left when it finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything promised plus
customer_reviews.text: When I first started researching robot vacs, I was skeptical about their capacity to thoroughly clean different floor surfaces. We've had this Neato D5 for less than a week and we're astonished at its ability to go from carpet to hardwood to linoleum without skipping a beat. Though not inexpensive, we now realize that this was indeed a wise investment. The hardest thing we had to contend with was finding six feet of unoccupied wall space on which to place the charging base. If I had to do it all over again, I'd say yes in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good while it worked. Lasted 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Botvac D5 in September 2017. This month, May 2018, it refused to go online, would not respond to manual cleaning requests, and would not pair after a reset. During the time I had it, I ran it at most about 15 times (I got it to clean under my low clearance beds). Needless to say, I’m not impressed. I expected the motors or other mechanical parts to give up before the electronics. Garbage product, not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Puzzler

customer_reviews.title: Received and set up vacuum on Sunday. "Geeves" made ...
customer_reviews.text: Received and set up vacuum on Sunday. "Geeves" made his first sweep that afternoon. Housekeepers came in Monday afternoon for a full house cleaning. Geeves was scheduled to sweep on Tuesday morning while we slept. Came downstairs and found Geeves had done his job and filled the bin to the top once again. Now my wife can relax and not have to worry about vacuuming that part of the house! Thanks Geeves!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So glad we decided to try one more
customer_reviews.text: Neato D5 Connected was our third try at a robot vacuum. We had a roomba and a BobSweep but both had issues with either navigating well or being able to handle the longer dog hair so they were both returned. Neato is impressive! So glad we decided to try one more. Does a great job maneuvering and getting itself out of tight spots. It runs a long time and I love that I get a report on the cleaning via the iphone app. Very, very happy with this purchase. You can stop looking - this is the one you want!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It vacuums better then I can
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Neato for about 10 months. It has made my house cleaner then ever! It vacuums better then I can. I never vacuum under my bed or other furniture. Also because it has a flat front and the beater bar is along the front edge it cleans into the corners. I have it programmed to vacuum 5 days a week, when I am at work. Now that me house is so much cleaner, I have less dust in my house and I only replace my air filler half as often. It did breakdown and Neato replaced it. Neato has very very good customer service and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but programming/connectivity is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is better than my previous Neato, and it’s great that it’ll recaahrge to finish cleaning. Miss the easy access to removing the roller though which made cleaning it much easier, this one is kind of a pain. While I loved the convenience of the app/connectivity, the vacuum is constantly losing its connection and then doesn’t vacuum when it’s not connected. Really miss being able to program the schedule from the actual vacuum instead of being limited to the app which it won’t connect to without completely resetting.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: 4 dog household
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 indoor dogs. As you can imagine we have lots of shedding. Before this robot vacuum we would walk in dreading cleaning up the floors. Now we come home to fur free rugs, tile, and hardwoods. What a relief! I will never be without a Neato Botvac. We have had other robot vacs but it did not do what this one does. Neato Botvac is very systematic in its cleaning and does not leave unvacuumed areas!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Cain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases in a long time. The no go lines work very well so it doesn’t get hung up in your house. We run it once a week in a house with no pets and still turns up a full dust bin every time. I am very impressed with its cleaning power. You still need to run a traditional vacuum around baseboards but it beats doing the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: oldschool1921

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Robot Vac!
customer_reviews.text: We've got two northern breed dogs that shed constantly. The new robot vac does a better job, keeping the hardwood floors clean than I do; gets into the "nooks and crannies" underneath furniture and desks wonderfully. This is a "keeper" and is begging for a companion 'bot on the 2nd floor...
customer_reviews.author: Thom Schiavone

customer_reviews.title: Won't comnect! Vacuums well but remote App is worthless
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed that I can't get this to work. Packing it up and sending it back with a negative review. I've tried all the troubleshooting fixes including using another phone as you suggested. I believe It's a problem with your servers. After trying with Neato support 4 times I looked at chat boards to see if this is isolated. I've never had any trouble connecting anything with my wifi in the past. I even called my internet provider. Looks like many others have the same issue with this product. So disappointed since I think it actually is a really good strong vacuum. But definitely NOT CONNECTED.
customer_reviews.author: William Drake

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of ****. DON'T BUY THIS, YOU'LL BE SORRY
customer_reviews.text: With every generation, Neato manages to make a progressively worse robot. When their first one came out, the only problem was battery life. Now, with their new connected technology, the D5 almost never works. I called tech support and wasted an hour of my time trying to get robot to work (it didn't) only to be told "my case would be reviewed". Buy an Iclebo!
customer_reviews.author: todd glyer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a wonder!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a lot to make sure this botvac worked well, I have to say I have had not a single issue with this robot. Connects and stays connected, returns to base and leaves my floors clean. At first I had the base in a hallway and would not find it, then I read online that the bot maps the base as it passes in front of it multi please times so moved it to the living room and never had that issue again. I would reccomended this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Danny S

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a year!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product while it works, but it's shelf life is one year. I am so disappointed that after one year, this vacuum and the replacement they sent after the first year stopped working. It has had the same motor issue each time where it tries to start but cannot. I am very disappointed in Neato customer service who told me that there was nothing they could do about it even though it sounded like a motor or laser issue, something I have no control over. The replacement vacuum only has a 90 day warranty. $600 for a vacuum that lasts one year is outrageous and a company that doesn't stand behind their product is even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Very smart, silent and efficient vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Beats my roomba by far! Very smart, silent and efficient vacuum. July/2020 update After 2 and half years of service, time has come to do some maintenance as battery was lasting only about 45 mins vs original 90 minute capacity. It was very easy and straightforward to replace the battery and I also got new brush and filters...On top of that I updated the firmware and the product works better now than when I bought it. Deeply respect brands that make everythig repairable. Kudos to Neato!
customer_reviews.author: FZ

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can control it from my phone
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can control it from my phone. I had the old botvac and upgraded it with this guy. It's like a member of the family. Run it daily, and it does such an amazing job. When it gets stuck (on kids toys) it has a map that shows me exactly where in my house he is. Super efficient and covers all areas of the house and navigates seamlessly. I do have 2 kids under 4 so sometimes hes having to navigate around obsticals they have let behind. Also does a marvelous job at cleaning up our puppies hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! We use this vacuum daily and it keeps our 3-dog household much cleaner. You do have to care for it (change the filters and clean well regularly) but still way more efficient overall. Good for light/basic maintenance but we do still use our shopvac or dyson for major messes. Works great on our hardwood and stone flooring (with lots of rugs). We've had Neato for over a year and if anything, love and appreciate it more each day!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Far Superior to Shark R85
customer_reviews.text: Two or three weeks before we purchased the Neato D5 we bought a Shark R85. What a difference (See my review of the Shark). The D5 cleans 1800 square feet of tile and hardwood in about an hour and a half. It stays out of trouble without any magnetic boundary strips, (which the Shark ignored and tried to eat). It's cleaning pattern is efficient and methodical and its software is WiFi updateable. It finds it's way home without any difficulty, (the Shark never did). We couldn't be happier with the Neato D5. And no, I don't work for Neato.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blizzard

customer_reviews.title: Intelligent robot
customer_reviews.text: I returned my ILife robot 2in 1, and bought this. It follows map and doesn’t like other robot only clean randomly. It’s little loud but still acceptable. The gabage bin is too small, need to change very time,—my Home is quite clean. Anyway I am satisfied with his performance. Just buy vacuum robotic, never go 2 in 1, vacuum and mop, who will change the tank every time?
customer_reviews.author: Neruda

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept - Utterly Awful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in concept and when it works it is brilliant. The customer support that backs this product should get an award for least responsive customer service of any company in the year 2018. I had the product for less than 60 days and after contacting warranty support on at least 5 occasions spanning over a month have received no response. I believe they are waiting it out only to tell me my warranty is void. Stay away from this product....stick to Costco or a more responsive company!
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: Its great, clean very well
customer_reviews.text: Its great, clean very well, but on the second time, there was a high noise from the side brush, we are now evaluate if the problem is with the brush or the motor...since we do not receive any update by neato's support we returned it, and because it cleans very well we chouse an exchange by Amazon. We received a new unit there was no noise on side brusch but that unit works eratic and stopped to clean every time, after hours chatting with support more them 3 times, the problem was not solved and we returned that second unit to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A Angel

customer_reviews.title: "Neaty McNeaterson" improves quality of life for me
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma, a dog and live among a fairly dusty environment when not confined indoors. I live with a "rescue" inhaler and frequently need it around. Having the Neato vacuum everyday keeps allergens from becoming rampant in my home. I literally feel the difference in every deep breath I can take more frequently now that Neato has integrated into the family housekeeping routine. Thank you, NeatoRobotics for this technology. The BotVac D5 Connected has genuinely improved my quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Roomba ESPECIALLY for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I had the Roomba 880 for pet hair and it filled up quickly, dropped hair all over my floor, and had many other issues. I have 3 dogs and a cat. This vacuum has a very large container for hair and debris. It works so much better than Roomba! It cleans much more efficiently, sends messages right to your phone, doesn't clog, and does exactly what it should. Also, the room/area barriers are MUCH better than Roomba's "walls" because they work without batteries and don't die after one use. The vacuum is a little noisy but no noisier than the Roomba. This vacuum is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: J Black

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love my Neato. This is my second one. The first lasted 6 years. I've had 3-5 dogs in my house during that time and hardly any dog hair on my floors. Because it keeps up the hair everyday 7- days a week we do not have the smell that sometimes comes with having a lot of dogs. I have been very pleased with the first and this one is even better. Quieter with a larger dirt bin. I also have the filter for animal dander. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crflara

customer_reviews.title: works great... until it doesn't  *(UPDATE:  unit replaced)*
customer_reviews.text: The Neato did a great job cleaning and the battery life was really impressive. But at just a little over a year old, it just stopped working. We have a 3 bedroom, 2 bath house and only used the Neato two, maybe three times a month - so after no more than 40 cleanings, it would no longer connect. Because it is more than 9 months old, Neato has no solution other than to buy a new one. Buyer beware. UPDATE: Neato reached out to me after my review - and ultimately replaced our non-working unit. So far it's working/connecting great... and what amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: GATOR*CJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months. Contacted support, couldn't help me, had me trying things that weren't related to the issue. After all of that the only option was to send it back and pay for it since they couldn't diagnose the issue. Not worth the money, go someplace else for a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever!! Cleans great. Has a large enough dust pan that it can clean my 1300 sq ft. First floor twice before needing to be emptied. Manuevers from carpet to wood floor to area rugs with ease. It uses a radar instead of an algorithm so it starts cleaning of the perimeters then cleans the middles. It's battery can last 90 minutes on a charge and it will go back to its charger to re charge. It then picks up where it left off. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of robot vacs and I am so impressed with the D5 connected! I am a busy mom of 3 with 2 big dogs. I was looking for a botvac to clean the floor daily, in-between actually cleaning the floors! I am so impressed--cleans very thoroughly and picks up dog hair and debris from my tile floor, hardwood and carpet! A MUST for any busy mom!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ballentine

customer_reviews.title: works for 5 months and collapsed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it here at Amazon. Was using it no more than twice a week for 1 cycle, and now, after only 5 months it collapsed. After starting the cleaning process, it moves from the base, doing its usual beeps, but doesn't really starts the cleaning and stays stuck. It repeats for 3 times and then red error LED blinks and the app directs me to the support. Now I followed the support guidelines x2 times, and it didn't resolve the issue. Currently, sent the support additional information and waiting for them to come back to me. Who would believe it will stop working after only 5 months...
customer_reviews.author: Tal Bensimhon

customer_reviews.title: Works with Google Home too
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it a surprisingly smart vacuum with a slightly undersized dust bin, but now it works with Google Home too! Best robot vacuum for the money, hands down. Even the mother-in-law wants to switch to the Neato from her Roomba 860.
customer_reviews.author: corey murillo

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Amazing job of going under beds and dressers, sofas, etc. where our old vacuum wouldn't go at all. Pretty quiet. There is some furniture and electric cord arranging if we don't want to have rescue the stuck bot. Only problem is the wifi coverage in our house isn't complete, but that's not the bot's fault. Like having a pet that vacuums and you don't have to feed it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has been truly astounding in it's manuevering and cleaning abilities! We have a long haird German Shepherd and 3 cats and it has absutely no problem with any of the hair or dirt. It gets into the tightest corners, under stairs and furniture, is quiet enough for us to run at night downstairs and it will not wake us up. This is a life changer!!! 110% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Error 3000 (Sensor issue) is a high occurence issue
customer_reviews.text: We bought this back in 2017 and within a year we had to send it back because the sensors faulted. They did send a new one but within 4 months it had the same sensor errors and when we contacted customer service they would not replace or fix the issue. They stated that the warranty only covers the first 12 months from the original purchase. Per the individual I talked too even though a new robot was sent the warranty time was only for the first 12 months of the original purchase and not the replacement. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fraser

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing appliance you can purchase for your home
customer_reviews.text: The botvac D5 is the most intelligent automated vacuum on the market. I swear this little bugger even has feelings! It is thorough, attentive, and brings a smile to my face every time I see it is a roving Dust bunny. This thing goes underneath our couch, tables, bed, and vanities it doesn't miss a single square inch of our home. I don't know how we did it without this amazing invention.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin H.

customer_reviews.title: When it works it's great. But you have no Warranty Support
customer_reviews.text: bot worked great for a few months, rarely returns to the base, but mostly works if i find it and carry it back to charge. My biggest problem is there is no warranty support. I'm a month in explaining my issues and have gotten no where. How many times can I tell them the same thing? My initial emails lists my bot model and the issues, the email i get back is what robot do you have? what issues are you having. Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I love my Neato!
customer_reviews.text: My Neato cleans three times a week and has never had an issue. When I come home from work it’s patiently waiting for me to empty it’s bin. It texts me during the day to let me know when it’s done cleaning. I’m so happy with my Neato. I also love thst it has a 90 degree corners to clean my corners.
customer_reviews.author: Fred G.

customer_reviews.title: Excited and impressed
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go a model down than I original wanted and I’m not disappointed. Cleaned my duplex in just 30 minutes. The D5 navigated just fine through my complex floor plan. It did get lost once because I didn’t blocked off underneath my bed and it got stuck. Behind some empty boxes. It was a bit louder than I expected but significantly quieter than your average vacuum cleaner. It made it back to the dock on the first try even after I had to get it unstuck from under my bed.excellent. 5 stars because I got what exactly whatNInexpected and it has helped me out so much.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Tavadia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum stops working with no real indication of what the problem is. Earlier versions with LCD screen work better. Vacuum is currently inoperable, factory provided tips to clear problem do not resolve problem. The Android connected app is next to worthless, It should provide an error message to point to the problem area.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Eppinger

customer_reviews.title: Problem Turning On
customer_reviews.text: So far, my experience has not been positive. Bought my Neato in January 2017. The first time I emptied the bin, it would not go back in. The company sent me a new dust bin and that now works. However, now the bot will not turn on. The display is not lit up and I don't know why it won't turn on. iPhone says its "offline". This is a follow-up to the foregoing comments. The robot is now working; I'm nut sure what changed but will monitor and hopefully there wont be a repeat of the problem. The only thing I did was remove the brush and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: J M R

customer_reviews.title: Botvac D5 Connected is a GREAT investment!
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of an “extreme” shedding dog, the stresses of double (at times triple) sweeping/vacuuming our floors have finally been relieved! Impressive engineering of this product; performs efficiently! Love the mapping! I was concerned our dog might be anxious around it but it appears he is not frightened. I now have more time to spend with my daughter when coming home from work! Thank you Neato!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Hayes

customer_reviews.title: It's quick and easy. 1
customer_reviews.text: Publish your review on Amazon Help others pick Neato Botvac D5 Connected . It's quick and easy. 1. Copy your review text: neato D5 Your rating: 5 It does a great job and I like it most because it gets under the beds and cleans the floors that are hard to do with a big vac. I like the Neato D5 because it does a great job, but I like it most because it cleans under the beds and that is a hard place to do with a large vac.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good Sucking. Bad WiFi.
customer_reviews.text: As a vacuum I'd rate it as just ok. As a robot vacuum it hands down beats the roomba with double the sucking power and way better room coverage. However, it constantly drops WiFi connectivity. The only way to get wifi connected again is to follow the setup instructions again. Dirt capacity is tiny (but no worse than the roomba's) and while the bin is easy to remove, it's awkward to re-attach.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical and hesitated on purchasing a robot vacuum thinking they were just a gimmick. After a lot of research I decided to go with the Neato D5 and was blown away! This thing gets under the bed, couches and tough to reach areas. Picks up stuff we didn't know was there.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a husky/shepherd mix and this thing has saved us hours in vacuuming as we were having to use our standard vacuum everyday. It runs well in the dark, cleans corners well, and only gets stuck every once in a while. We also love that y I can schedule the cleaning times. Best purchase we have made in a while!
customer_reviews.author: RJK29

customer_reviews.title: Many problems.  After 2 years of light use the unit is dead.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this brand. This thing is not well engineered and is susceptible to breakdown. When the unit was working it would stop mid vacuuming at leat half of the time for no apparent reason (software issue?). My colleagues at work bought Roomba and don't have these problems. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: LeftCoastShopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for long.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a year and a half, after that it became completely useless. Will not even make it out of one room anymore. For this amount of money something like this should not happen in this amount of time. Customer service only refers you to a separate company that will try to repair the unit. I will probably just save my money on repairing and try a different company.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Better than I would ever have imagined!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage and ability to navigate and get every possible space larger than the robot. It does not always seem to take the shortest routes to clean rooms but does a fantastic job. Takes some work to remove my girls’ long hair from the roller but I am amazed every time I empty the dust bin at how much it picks up. I can identify every space in my house clearly by the coverage maps and move items that are obstacles for the next clean. One of my most worthwhile purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ben J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, much better than Roomba.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a Roomba 960, worked terribly with our ranch style home (single floor), no methodical approach to cleaning, and ran directly over large amounts of debris. Switched to the Neato D5 Connected Bot: extremely easy to set up and first run was a huge success. Perfectly mapped out our house, approached each room in methodical sections, picked up everything that it went over, even things on the very edge of the bot. Worked slowly and needed a recharge before finished, but floors were SPOTLESS after its run. Very excited and optimistic about this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Michalak

customer_reviews.title: D5 Connected
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent! No random patterns like other robots. It works like a champ. We are very pleased with its performance!
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this product! It really does map out the room and covers every inch of it. I love being able to see what all it scans on the app too. I was worried that I should buy the next level up for battery life, but this one is perfect for our house. We can run it while we are gone all day and it has to recharge twice but it does cover our entire house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work - Out of Box Failure
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work when I opened it. Tried to work with the manufactures support team but they never responded by the time I gave up and was going to return it, it was too late. That’s a lot of money down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy. No complaints. Had it for a week. Neato has a tendency to find small objects that we didn't know we're on the floor this can cause it to be noisy,. Easy to fix if you find the paper clip or something similar. I still recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bee Herder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a Neato
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with a $729 machine. Within the 1 year warranty, the Neato pulls away from the base for a foot then stops. Neato replaced it and sent a new one. Then the second one had the same issue. They would not replace the second one. We could either pay to have it repaired or buy a new one. They have not resolved the defect in this model. Don’t waste your money with Neato. We will be looking to buy a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Neato D5 Connected for almost a week and this purchase is literally the best purchase I’ve ever made!! My floors look amazing. I look so forward to walking in the door after work and seeing beautiful, clean floors. It’s magical! My only complaint isn’t a huge one. Some people talked about running it at night when they slept. It’s a bit louder than I thought it would be. I do it either while I’m away or while I’m upstairs getting ready for the day. I’ve told everyone I can about this product and have a few that plan to purchase it as well.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I hate vacuuming and this has been a great purchase. Very quiet and navigates well. Occasionally closes itself in a room and it's hard to get the door open so it would be nice if the app had some kind of "back up" command. Sometimes becomes disconnected from wifi and I'm not sure why. Carpets look great. Easy to empty. Doesn't run in to lots of stuff. One charge gets a first pass over my 1800 sq ft house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Neato Botvac D5 Connected Laser Guided Robot Vacuum, Pet & Allergy, Works with Smartphones, Alexa, Smartwatches
product_meta.description: Don’t you just love the feeling of an immaculately clean floor? That’s why there’s the Botvac D5 Connected. Its D-shape design and side brush are perfect for cleaning corners and the side of walls where pet hair and debris hide. LaserSmart technology scans and maps your rooms ensuring the robot cleans the room thoroughly. Plus, the ultra performance filter helps trap stuff you can’t see — cleaning deeper and more thoroughly than the competition. And with up to 90 minutes of battery life, the Botvac D5 is perfect for most homes.
feature_bullets: LaserSmart technology intelligently navigates and maps your home, cleaning in straight lines instead of a random pattern.
D-shape design, large core brush, and side brush finds pet hair and debris where they hide - in corners and along walls.
The ultra performance filter captures up to 99% of tiny dust mites and allergens as small as 10 microns.
Perfect for cleaning on any surface - hardwood, carpet or tile
Get up to 90 minutes of battery life*, perfect for most homes.
Auto charge & resume lets your robot return to base to power up and then go back out and pick up where it left off.
Use the Neato app to schedule cleanings daily, every other day, or on a schedule that works for you.
Easily control your robot from your phone, smartwatch, Amazon Echo, and Google Home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars1,362 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Hard floor, Brand Newï¼ŒFactory Sealed!, Carpet, Dual action
specifications.Included Components: Neato Botvac D5 Connected Includes:Wi-Fi Enabled Robot Vacuum INSTALLED: Ultra Performance Filter, Combo Brush and Side BrushIntegrated Charge BasePower Cord
